General.Name: International Parkside Products Inc
General.Description: International Parkside Products Inc. engages in producing and marketing of optical, screen cleaning, and eyeglass cleaning products. Its optical lens cleaning devices include LensPen, PEEPS, DigiKlear, Mini-Pro, Mini-Pro II, MicroPro, Smartphone camera cleaner, Laptop Pro, ScreenKlean, FilterKlear, DSLR Pro Kit, SensorKlear, SensorKlear Loupe Kit, SmartKlear, HunterPro Kits, Outdoor Pro Kits, FogKlear, Photo Pro Kits, Hurricane blower, and Microfiber cloth. The company markets its products through wholesale distributors in North America, Europe, Japan and rest of Asia, Russia, Australia, New Zealand, and internationally. International Parkside Products Inc. was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Richmond, Canada.
General.Address: 788 Beatty Street, Richmond, BC, Canada, V6B 2M1
